mapper.select:
select c.*,u.nickName as userName,u.mobilePhone as userPhone, w.nickName as waiterName,w.mobilePhone as waiterPhone from complain c join user_info u on c.uid=u.uid left join user_info w on c.wid=w.uid
where c.status=#{status}
order by c.createDate desc
order by c.updateDate desc

select c.*,u.nickName as userName,u.mobilePhone as userPhone, m.status as menuStatus,m.dishsMoney,m.carriageMoney, w.nickName as waiterName,w.mobilePhone as waiterPhone from complain c left join user_info u on c.uid=u.uid left join user_info w on c.wid=w.uid
left join menu m on c.mid=m.mid
left join market_menu m on c.mid=m.mid
where c.comId=#{comId}
